ASME BPVC.II.A-2025 SA-524/SA-524M 
SPECIFICATION FOR SEAMLESS CARBON STEEL PIPE 
FOR ATMOSPHERIC AND LOWER TEMPERATURES 
SA-524/SA-524M 
(Identical with ASTM Specification A524/ A524M-21 except for the deletion of alternate elongation and deletion of SI
